Privacy Policy

Last Updated: January 3, 2026

1. Information We Collect

We collect information you provide directly to us, including:

  • Email address and name (via OAuth)
  • GitHub and Google account information
  • Usage data and analytics
  • Project and deployment metadata

2. How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to:

  • Provide, maintain, and improve our services
  • Process transactions and send related information
  • Send technical notices and support messages
  • Monitor and analyze trends and usage

3. Data Storage and Security

Your data is stored securely using:

  • TLS 1.3 encryption for data in transit
  • AES-256 encryption for data at rest
  • Cloudflare global network infrastructure
  • Google Cloud Secret Manager for credentials

4. Data Sharing

We share your data only with:

  • Cloudflare (infrastructure provider)
  • Google Cloud (authentication and secrets)
  • Supabase (database and storage)

We never sell your data to third parties.

5. Your Rights (GDPR)

You have the right to:

  • Access your personal data
  • Correct inaccurate data
  • Request deletion of your data
  • Export your data
  • Opt-out of marketing communications

6. Contact Us

For privacy concerns: privacy@meauxcloud.org
